name: Gorgeous Headwear Blueprint Chest
description: Open it to randomly receive one valuable headwear Blueprint.

name: Gorgeous Headwear Female
description: This ornate black satin top hat will make you the king of the midnight cocktail party.

name: Gorgeous Headwear Male
description: This ornate black satin top hat will make you the queen of the midnight cocktail party.

name: Graceful Sakura
description: A hair dye from the ancient Sakura City, added with unique cherry petals, it will make the hair slightly pink just as cherry blossoms.

name: Gram Dust
description: The soul sealed in the card, formed after thousands of years of precipitation, is a material that can be used to synthesize cards, obtained by card decomposition.

name: Grampa Beard
description: When you wear it, You'll feel the heaviness of the beard.

name: Grampa Beard Blueprint
description: When you wear it, You'll feel the heaviness of the beard.

name: Grand Chef·Broth
description: Thank you for your outstanding contribution in the field of making broth. The Cuisine Association hereby awards you this headwear to prove your long-lasting effort in studying food.
